title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 625.1 - Hearings and appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 625.1 - Hearings and appeals

State Regulations

Any determination regarding rights to and amounts of

State training, subsistence, and transportation allowances shall be subject to
hearings and appeals as provided under title 8 of the Unemployment Insurance

Law for claims to benefits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
625.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
